original_text: That is the list of all the pieces of land that each tribe received. Eleazar the priest, Joshua, son of Nun, and the Israelite leaders used lots to decide which part of the land was for each tribe. They did this in Shiloh, in front of the Tent of Meeting. The Lord was there with them. In that way, they finished giving each tribe a part of the land.
korean_text: 제사장 엘르아살과 눈의 아들 여호수아와 이스라엘 자손의 지파의 족장들이 실로에 있는 회막 문 여호와 앞에서 제비 뽑아 나눈 기업이 이러하니라 이에 땅 나누는 일을 마쳤더라

sentences.original_text: That is the list of all the pieces of land
which part of the land was for each tribe
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 땅 부분이 각 지파를 위한 것인지를

sentences.original_text: in front of the Tent of Meeting
The Lord was there with them
they finished giving each tribe a part of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 각 지파에게 땅의 한 부분을 주는 것을 마쳤습니다
